content.title: Hi, I'm Ekaterina.
content.text:
I'm a front-end developer who's been diving into code for over 4 years. I'm kinda obsessed with micro animations and the latest tech stuff. It's all about making the web a cooler place, right?

I've had a blast working on media and interactive projects. There's nothing more rewarding than seeing someone enjoy something you've built in the digital world!

If you're thinking we might make a good team for a project, drop me a line

If you're in need of an expert in HTML5, CSS, JS, and someone proficient with the React/Vue/Typescript stack, then you're in the right place.

I not only bring technical expertise but also a keen sense of aesthetics and a deep understanding of UI patterns. I have a strong passion for media-related projects, captivating UI/UX designs, and creating interactive experiences that truly resonate with users.

Feel free to get in touch!

experience.stack: React, Typescript, Less, Redux, JavaScript, PHP
Vue.js, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SVG, Canvas
